title: Create a Social Video from an Article
description: A social media editor needs to create a short, subtitled video for Facebook based on a recently published article.

tasks.description: Select 3-4 key facts or quotes from the article.
tasks.expected_outcome: The most impactful points are identified.

tasks.description: Find relevant stock video clips or photos to serve as the visual background.
Use a social video creation tool to combine the text and visuals into a short video (e.g., 60 seconds).
Add subtitles to the video, as most social media videos are watched with the sound off.
tasks.expected_outcome: The video is accessible to users watching without sound.
